scripts.export: next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && touch out/CNAME && echo "laughinggoatghana.com" >> out/CNAME git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin master
scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin master
